title: STAT+: Acting head of beleaguered mental health agency to depart this week
description: SAMHSA, amid continuing crises in mental health and addiction, has been hit by heavy cuts in personnel and funding under President Trump.
content: SAMHSA, amid continuing crises in mental health and addiction, has been hit by heavy cuts in personnel and funding under President Trump.
